attributes.action: Reduce child benefit to fund free school meals for all children (money to directly benefit children not parents)
attributes.additional_details: Child benefit for most is used for the benefit of children but in some cases funds the parent’s lifestyle.  As a way of ensuring the child benefits from the money, reduce the child benefit for school age children by, for example, £10 a week to DIRECTLY fund free school meals (at a DESCENT standard) for all school children.
